title: We Pulled Together ... And Won!
description: A salute to the veterans of World War II and those who supported the war effort in so many different ways on the home front. Filled with stirring accounts from those who served overseas, humorous memories of boot camp blunders and touching tales of those who boosted morale stateside, this compilation will take you back to a patriotic era...whether you lived through it or are simply moved by the devotion and can-do spirit of those who did.
author: Deb Mulvey
